tool_description: Simple API for periodic table data
title: Periodic Table

api_list.name: Get All Elements
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com/api/elements"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get The Custom Element Object With Only Asked Properties
api_list.description: It returns the list of all elements with only asked properties and in the order in which they were asked.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com/api/elements/custom-properties/{properties}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Names of All Elements

api_list.name: Get Atomic Mass  of All Element
api_list.description: It returns the list of the atomic mass of all elements.

api_list.name: Get Element By Symbol
api_list.description: It returns the requested element by the provided symbol.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com/api/elements/symbol/{symbol}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Properties
api_list.description: It Returns all properties of the element.
